roleset.name: involuntarily open mouth wide
roleset.note: YAWN-V NOTES: VN updated by Julia, 10/2010. Member of Vncls hiccup-40.1.1, nonverbal_expression-40.2. (from yawn.01-v)
YAWNING-N NOTES: Based on sentences in medpedia-part1-nouns. Comparison to 'yawn.01'. See VN classes hiccup-40.1.1 and nonverbal_expression-40.2. Framed by Katie. (from yawning.01-n predicate notes)

roles.note: Frameset could probably be expanded to include theme and recipient args, if necessary. Clearly it hasn't come up yet, or such args would exist. (from yawn.01-v)

example.name: automatically generated
example.text: Then he would yawn and stretch and shout , `` All out .
